flawed_nl_solution:
Jack had 13 more than 8 notebooks for a total of 13+8 = <<13+8=22>>22 notebooks
He gave 5 notebooks to Paula so he has 22-5 = <<22-5=17>>17 notebooks left
He gave another 6 to Mike so he has 17-6 = <<17-6=11>>11 notebooks left
#### 11

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21, not 22. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
